headline: TD Cowen is Bullish on Colgate-Palmolive Company (CL)
summary: Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) is among the 7 Best Beauty Stocks to Buy Right Now. On January 8, 2026, TheFly reported that TD Cowen reduced Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL)’s price target from $90 to $86 and maintained a Buy rating. TD Cowen’s projection for consumer staples in 2026 included the change. The corporation anticipates a difficult year […]

headline: What happens to oil if Iran closes the Strait of Hormuz?
summary: Investing.com -- A closure of the Strait of Hormuz would trigger a “dramatic” shock to global oil markets and shipping, according to Kepler Cheuvreux in a note on Wednesday.
